messages.1000055602: When the attack accurately hits the enemy with Critical, additional damage is dealt by a certain rate. The additional damage is not affected by weapon attribute.\n#yTrigger Rate {0}%\n{1}% additional damage of Critical
messages.1000089459: Charged Shot's attack area, attack power and action speed are increased and you will get #y[Wind Arrow]#w when Charged Shot hits enemies accurately with Critical. When there is more than {0} #y[Wind Arrow]#w, you can use {1} #y[Wind Arrow]#w to use #y[Wind Shaft]#w attack. You can hold the Normal Attack Button down to charge longer to use #y[Wind Shaft]#w attack. When #y[Wind Shaft]#w is rebounding, you can use skills that can be used during Tumble.\n#yCharged Shot's ATK increased by {2}%\n[Wind Shaft]'s ATK per hit : Charged Shot's {3}%
messages.1000094740:
A giant flower is summoned at the targeted location. The summoned flower will sprinkle pollen that attracts enemies and explode right before it disappears to deal damage.
Additionally, the character's final damage value for ATK will be increased for a while when the skill is used
#yATK {0}%
Explodes {1} sec after being summoned when enemy is identified
Final damage increased by {2}%
Duration {3} sec
messages.1000093718:
Aerial Chain Shot causes explosions on the ground to increase attack area and after the skill is used, additional damage can be given by entering Special Attack button. You will attain #y[Wind Arrow]#w when Aerial Chain Shot hits enemies accurately with Critical.
#yAdditional Hit ATK ({0}% of Aerial Chain Shot)
#yCritical resistance reduced by {1}%
Duration {2} sec
messages.1000094408: Siege Stance's range and attack power are increased. Use Special Attack Button instead of Normal Attack Button to spray {0} small arrows to the front. Range of small arrows is shorter and has {1}% ATK per arrow. You will get #y[Wind Arrow]#w when Siege Stance hits enemies accurately with Critical.\n#ySiege Stance's ATK increased by {2}%
messages.1000088866: Arrow Shower's number of arrows showered is increased. Additional damage is given when you use Normal Attack button. You will get #y[Wind Arrow]#w when Arrow Shower hits enemies accurately with Critical.\n#yAdditional Hit ATK (Arrow Shower's {0}%)
messages.1000094741: Attack power increases by #y{0}%#w and you will get #y[Wind Arrow]#w when #y[Wind Shaft]#w hits enemies accurately with Critical. Additionally, Final Damage of Arrow Barrage increases by #y{1}%#w.
messages.1000096393: Explosive damage is increased.\n#yExplosion damage increased by {0}%
messages.1000096119:
When #y[Fake Shot]#w is used, #y[Siege Stance EX]#w changes to Instant. All fire power is concentrated in one shot.

#yOwn ATK increases by {0}%
Siege Stance shares cooldown with Instant
messages.1000088865: Siege Stance's range and attack power are increased. Use Special Attack button instead of Normal Attack Button to spray {0} small arrows to the front. Range of small arrows is shorter and has {1}% ATK per arrow. You will get #y[Wind Arrow]#w when Siege Stance hits enemies accurately with Critical.\n#ySiege Stance's ATK increased by {2}%\nDamage received while using Siege Stance reduced by {3}%
